mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board (q_no, id, email, q_title, q_content, q_date) VALUES(qna_board_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{email}, #{q_title}, #{q_content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT q_no, id, q_title, q_date FROM (SELECT q_no, id, q_title, q_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY q_no DESC) AS RNUM FROM qna_board WHERE 1 = 1 ) QNA WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY q_no DESC
SELECT COUNT(q_no) FROM qna_board WHERE 1 = 1 AND q_no > 0
